111.title: Strength

1112.content:
Popping into a forest, you do some exercises before heading off in a random direction. As you wander through the woods, you gather some herbs, resulting in getting the Forage LV.1 skill, and you eventually decide to make potions afterwards when you find an appropriate station to do so. Gathering enough herbs that you level up to LV.4, you realize that you have no idea what you were grabbing and sigh, wishing you had the power to figure out things as you carefully look at a leaf. A ding is heard, similar to the one you received before when you got the Forage skill, and see you got the Analyze LV.1 skill. You immediately use it, leveling it up to LV.2, and see you gathered mostly magic and healing herbs, though you gathered some poisonous ones as well. Putting them side, you see you gained a bit of experience from foraging, however, it wasn't much, seeing how it didn't reach halfway to double digits.

"It seems I'll have to kill something in order to gain experience," you said to yourself, picking up some big rocks and sticks to turn them into.

After making a club, and some tools, you try them out a bit until you gained their respective skills before continuing to wander around. After spending the day of exploring and harvesting ingredients, you decide to take a break and build a temporary shelter. The next day, you do the same thing as before, only this time you encounter a berry bush, and you were hungry, having nothing before eating the pink berries. Turns out it was poisonous, though very weak, and you vomited it out as your Analyze wasn't high enough to properly scan it, losing 5 HP. You still collect it as may be useful later in the future and head off. As you're walking down the forest, you hear something and bring out your wooden club as you stealthily crouched towards the source. As you near it, you hear some burst of flatulence and a woman muttering under her breath as the source. Coming about five meters to her, you stay inside of a bush keeping yourself hidden and you could hear her speak.
"Damn those bandits! It was bad when they were in my gut, struggling to give me indigestion, but they definitely are giving me hell as they're coming out and I think they went straight to my ass!" She said to herself, as a wet fart sputters out her butt as something splutters to the ground.
Grabbing some leaves, the mysterious woman wipes herself, revealing a bit of her large rump to you, though it was too dark for you to tell what species she was. After getting dressed, she soon comes out of cover, sporting massive tits and a large belly from consuming a bunch of bandits, despite digesting them. Stepping on a twig, you alert her of your presence.
"Come out! If you don't, I'll treat you the same as an enemy!" She warns, her purple eyes glaring in your general direction.
"Fine, if you come out as well. Same deal as you said before!" You holler back, getting up with your club in hand and a spear in the other.
"Not bad looking...I'll come out as well," she said, stepping out of the shade and revealing herself as a(n)...

1112.title: Your Wild Beginning

11121.content:
Wearing a blue tank top with sleeves that revealed her shoulders and jean shorts that clung to her wide hips and butt with combat boots, was a beautiful, raven haired girl. Her straight hair was hovering over shoulders by a few centimeters and strapped to her thick thighs were two long knives. You could see she wasn't wearing a bra, as nipples on her large tits were poking through her shirt. Her eyes were a bit weird, as it was purple with a yellow, flowery swirl for iris, as it paired with her michievious smile, but what got your attention was her massive gut. Drooping a bit over, its girth would make most people assume she was overdue on a pregnancy for quintriplets, but after eavesdropping on her earlier before, you knew the horrfiying answer. Using Analyze, you check out her stats.

Name: Rachel
Race: Human
LVL: 37
Class: Rogue
Health: 100/100
Willpower: 100/100
Highest stat: 56 Agility

Seeing that as the limit of your Analyze, you begin to think up a lie to save yourself before she talks.
"Hi, I'm Rachel. What's your name?" "Hercules!"
You internally curse yourself about the lack of creativity for your name and the quickness of your answer as she quickly dismisses the abruptness of it.
"So, what's your story, doing all the way in the woods?" She asks, you again telling her that you lived in the mountains, isolated from everyone and start asking about the world you're in, despite knowing details about it.
"I'm surprised you lived here in the Wild Woods! Not exactly a pleasant place to be in and in fact, it's dangerous here, so let's get to the captial. It's not too far from here!" She said, leading the way and you following her.
As she explains things you know, you could see her blush and look behind her, directly at you, as she shows off her basketball sized glutes to you. Once you two see the wall of the city before you, she bends over in pain as a cramp runs through her.
"You okay?" "It's just these bandits don't seem to want to play nice with me, that's all!" She said, wincing in pain.
"Do you want me to do something for you?" "Nah, it's... Actually, can you massage my tummy?" She asks, looking a bit childish in her demand and beefore you knew it, a notification came before you, making it your first quest.
Kind of bummed out by it, you still take it, mentally pushing Yes, and start pressing into her belly. It was quite squishy and you could hear sloshing sounds coming within, plus moaning from Rachel as you hit her sweet spot. Pressing at different spots, you gain different expression from Rachel, until you touch above her navel.
"There! That's the spot!" She moans in pleasure and you continue to massage there until a heavy groan comes from her guts.
As you both pause at it, a thunderous sound that last about 10 seconds comes out of her ass as Rachel's face reddens in embarrassment and you immediately gag on the horrendous smell. Grabbing your hand, Rachel runs off with you to the gate, as her face burns up and you recover from the smell. Once you reach the gate, she shows off an id badge to the guard and he lets you guys in. As you continue to walk through the capital, Rachel realizes she's holding your hand and comes closer to you and rests her head on your shoulder.
"Ummm, can you tell me where the guild is and possibly where I can find a place to stay at for the moment?" You ask, Rachel enjoying her time with you until you nudge her a bit.
"What, what? Oh, Guild and an inn. The guild is up ahead, can't miss it! As for an inn, go right at the fountain, than left before marketplace, and you should see a building with a mug pireced by a sword for a sign right off the bat! But for now, let's..." She said, before her stomach growls again, angrily this time and she clutches it in pain as she mutters about bandits.
"I have 'business' to attend to, so until we meet again, Hercules! Cause you owe me one!" She said, running as fast as she can, with her hand between her ass cheeks and failing to prevent small puffs of flatulence coming out of her rear, but not after kissing you on the cheek.
Watching her go, you could feel something lustful growing in you for a bit before shaking it off and deciding on your next destination. A ding is heard and you see you completed the quest and get 7 EXP for it.

Where do you go to next, adventurer?

11121.title: First contact with humans

111211.content:
Entering the guild, you could feel their most of the adventurers' stares on you as you go to register. A woman, who was available behind the counter, smiles at you when you arrive at the counter and greets you warmly.
"Hi there! Seeing this is the first time, I can assume you're here to register?" She asks, you nodding your head.
"Okay then, can you fill out this form, so we can start and I'll explain everything as you do so."
Getting a sheet of paper and pen in front of you, your body automatically writes down everything required, much to the receptionist's surprise.
"Wow, that was quick!" She says before explaining.
"As you wait for your status plate to be made, I'll quickly do a run down for you: you'll start at rank F and earn rep points to go to the next rank by doing either quests, which can be found over there, or doing grand deeds, though the rep points are dependent on your attitude and level of difficulty of the quest. The max amount of quests that can be taken are three at a time and you can take quests that are either equal to your rank, lower than the current rank you're at, or one rank higher than yours, though it'll be worth as two quests taken. However, if you join a party that has a high rank level, you'll be able to do those quests together, though the loot will be shared equally. Discounts will be made for you at most stores and inns, where they'll show the guild's insignia, and you can work at other guilds while you travel around, whether you're in this country or another. As for work quota, you have to do at least three quests a month at your current rank, but this can be lowered to once a year at rank A and finally, you don't have to worry about the quota at rank S. As you go around the world as an adventurer, please keep your behavior in check, as failure to do so or to uphold any of the previously mentioned rules will revoke your right as an adventurer. With that concluded, I hope you become a wonderful adventurer and amazingly, your status plate is completed already! So here you are, sir, and if have any questions, don't hesitate to ask me or another staff member. Thank you and have a great day!" She said, handing over your new status plate, though you can see your status at any time, regardless of having it or not.
Heading over to the quest counter, you take three quests that you deem easy (though you manage to complete one of them, as it was a herb gathering one, and grab another) and head off. By the time you complete them, the day is almost over and you return to the guild, receiving your rewards. Heading towards the inn Rachel recommend for you, rent a room and try to log out. However, as you reach the system menu, you can't find it.
"What the... Let me look for it," you mutter to yourself before realizing that you can't find the log out option anywhere.
"Probably a bug," you said to yourself and go to sleep, though you couldn't shake the bad feeling you were getting from this.
A week goes by in the game world and you're still depressed from realizing you're stuck in this virtual world, but you still move on by doing quests to pass the time and pay off the rent at the inn. During this week you bought yourself some proper gear and your completion rate improved. You also leveled up a few days ago and was surprised at the growth of stats you received. Today, you debate whether or not you'll go out to this world as a working man, but your stomach rumbles, convincing you to move. You decide to do something special for today.

1112111.content:
"Hey!" A familiar voice calls out to you and you turn to see Rachel again.
Rachel was wearing a white tank top and blue booty shorts this time, though that wasn't the thing that caught your attention. She was lacking a belly and judging from it, you could tell where it went. Her breasts grew up to double the size from before and her hips widened way past her shoulders while her thighs thickened to tree trunks, straining the knife straps to the max. You didn't even have to check state of her ass as it would have grown with her hips.
"It's been a while since we last met. Sorry for running off on you, but when nature calls, you answer it. Anyway, how's things going? Did my advice helped you out?" She asks, you nodding your head at questions and she smiles even more.
"By the way, where were you?" "Oh, my party had to do a quest out of town and it was a while before we came back."
You pause for a bit before asking a question.
"Say, do you want to party up with me for a bit?" You ask, Rachel widening her eyes before a hand grabs your shoulder.
"She's not interested!" A female says in an unfriendly tone, Rachel's face falls as you turn to face the newcomer.
Standing a few feet over you, a tanned muscular woman with muscles over her muscles, was grasping your shoulder hard. She was quite beautiful and possess large breasts that were covered by a furry metal bra while wearing a mix of metal and fur panties.
"Sarah, you don't have to be like that with him," Rachel said, pulling you away and into her breasts.
Both women were ready to fight and some people started to gather around while the staff were ready to intervene.
"Enough, you two! You're drawing a crowd in. We'll discuss this in private," a third woman said, garnering their attention to her before they look around, eyes staring at them, and they stop.
Seeing there wasn't going to be a fight, the crowd dispersed while the staff sighs in relief and you three follow the new woman inside a private room. As you follow behind them, you could see that Rachel's rump became at least larger than beach balls, almost making you think it was a small attached beanbag chair, and you apply some of your skill points into Seduction Resistance and Truth. As for the woman leading you all, she was a beautiful neko, wearing a light blue robes and her her long blonde hair contrasted to Sarah's black hair, who grabbed you before. The one thing that stood out to you wasn't her golden cat features, but her massive tits, rivaling Rachel's ass and was probably at least a K cup.
There was another woman inside the room when you entered, and saw she was much bigger than Sarah, in more ways than one. Her breasts were bigger than the neko's while her fat butt was larger than Rachel's and her gut was twice as large as the two combined. She was wearing a shrine maiden uniform with a blue outline and her owl rimmed glasses sat on her small nose. The short haired, even shorter than Rachel's, ginger giant was currently rubbing her belly.
Shutting the door, the neko soon starts the introductions.
"Hercules, was it? Sorry about the late intro, but my name is Carla, mage and leader of the B Class party, Surface Springs. You've already met our tank and theif, Sarah and Rachel respectively. Over there is our healer a faraway land, Miko and finally, our childish archer, Raven. Speaking of her where is she?" Carla asks, Miko looking at her questioningly, as bumps appear on the surface of her stomach.
"You should avoid her; her eye sight is really bad, despite her glasses, and throw in her air headness, plus her clumsiness, and you'll be either smothered, crushed, or eaten. Don't worry though! You won't die, as her gentleness and magic will prevent it and youll pass through her completely unharmed," she whispers, as Miko attempts to complain, but trips and falls down, causing a small quake to happen.
"Anyway, Rachel talked about you on our quest and it made us a bit curious about you, so tell me, what do you think of our dietary habits, hmm?" She asks, her eyes that were closed the whole time open for the first time, revealing cold, blue eyes.
"I guess it's a bit scary when it's against me, but it's something to get use to otherwise. It's really not my business to concern myself with it."
"I see, so you never told anyone about it?" "No, why?"
Carla remains silent for a long time, everyone was waiting for something to happen, as sweat rolled down your browser, until a low rumbling fart blew out of the catgirl's anus, ruffling her robes.
"Despite this world being run by carnial lust, not everyone looks forward to these sort of things, and by looking at you now, welcome to the team, newbie!" She said, her eyes closing and the atmosphere becoming light hearted, as Rachel pumps her arm in excitement while Sarah groans.
Anyway, me and Rachel have to register you in while Sarah packs our luggage for the next quest we're going to and Miko will try get Raven out of system. Hercules, you can choose any of them to help, then get your stuff on our wagon before the sun sets," Carla orders, Sarah and Rachel following her out of the room until it was just you two (plus Raven, who was inside of Miko).
You nervously wonder if they were actual players or sentient NPCs, but you push it back of your mind and decide who to help. The clumsy priestess, that could crush you to death, or hostile Amazon, who really doesn't like you?
